content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace (Position(5.0, 5.0))
Use-case: Smelts iron ore into iron plates to support advanced crafting requirements.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
– Copper Furnace (Position(-27.0, -60.0))
Use-case: Converts copper ore into copper plates for copper cable production and subsequent crafting steps.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Parameter Mismatch
  - Avoid passing unexpected keyword arguments (for example, using “radius” or supplying positional arguments when none are accepted). Verify the function signature before calling functions like get_entities.

• Handling Fallbacks and Iteration Over None
  - When a retrieval function may return None, ensure the result is safely defaulted (e.g. to an empty iterable) to prevent TypeError when iterating.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Resource Issues
  - Confirm that the expected structure (the Lab) is present in the inventory before attempting placement.
  - Validate that all sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available or can be produced. Prepare necessary intermediate resources by ensuring sufficient smelting or processing of ores before initiating Lab crafting attempts.
